newsitem.title: CROATIA: SOCCER-CROATIA 3 SLOVENIA 3 WORLD CUP QUALIFIER - RESULT.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-CROATIA 3 SLOVENIA 3 WORLD CUP QUALIFIER - RESULT.

text.p: Croatia and Slovenia drew 3-3 (halftime 2-1) in their World Cup European group one qualifier on Wednesday.

Croatia - 22-Tonci Gabric (12-Marijan Mrmic, 46), 20-Dario Simic, 5-Nikola Jerkan, 6-Slaven Bilic, 7-Aljosa Asanovic, 8-Robert Prosinecki, 9-Goran Vlaovic (16-Nenad Pralija, 68), 10-Zvonimir Boban, 11-Alen Boksic, 25-Goran Juric, 21-Igor Cvitanovic

Slovenia - 1-Bosko Boskovic; 2-Robert Englaro, 4-Miran Srebrnic, 3-Ales Krizan, 5-Mladen Rudonja, 7-Dzoni Novak, 6-Ales Ceh (17-Simon Sesler, 68), 9-Zlatko Zahovic, 8-Damjan Gajser (16-Amir Karic, 46), 11-Saso Udovic (18-Ermin Siljak, 46), 10-Primoz Gliha
Standings Pl W D L F A Pts
Next matches: April 30 Denmark v Slovenia, Greece v Croatia
